... Class
Should be equal ${result} Robot Classwork

... 0 2
Should be equal ${result} R0b0t Framework
Replace String Not Found ${result} = Replace String Robot bat
... bit
Should be equal ${result} Robot

... ${EMPTY}
Should be equal ${result} Robot${SPACE}

... Class 0
